Sample

Components for down-sampling data using a variety of methods including mode-median fc.data.sampler.modeMedian, largest triangle one bucket fc.data.sampler.largestTriangleOneBucket and three bucket fc.data.sampler.largestTriangleThreeBucket. For further details, see the d3fc-sample GitHub page.
